column6: The cover of [[Rockin' the Shire]] by ''Hobbit''.]]

column1: '''Hobbit''' is one of the oldest [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]] themed bands who sprouted back to the 70's. They paved the way for the Fantasy Rock genre and have become forged in the definition of [[Middle-earth]] [[Music]].

column1: Over the years, members of the band have been Paul "Turk" Henry (Bass/Vocals), Gene Fields (Vocals/R. Guitar), Keith Young (Drums), Richard Hill (Keyboard/L. Guitar), Andy Stevens, Tony Marsh and Tim Elliston.
''Hobbit'' has also been featured in [[Amon Hen 194]] as well as ''[[Ringers: Lord of the Fans]]''.
